document.full_text: the nfl players association went on offense by sending top players drew brees, peyton manning and tom brady into the game after negotiations for a new labor deal collapsed on friday.
document.title: players go on offense as labor talks with league collapse
lines_and_colors: the nfl players association went on offense by sending top players drew brees, peyton manning and tom brady into the game after negotiations for a new labor deal collapsed on friday.
